Encounter.Name: First Contact
Encounter.DescriptionText: Your Forces encountered a mysterious Organization called "The Draugar". They have sent you this message:

Message.Text: Ahh, we can smell your flesh even from here. Don't worry, tasty SING, we will contact you soon enough. But for now, we must leave.
You shiver and close the transmitter. Hopefuly they will not contact you too soon.
